fields.title: Interstellar
fields.review: Interstellar is probably one of the most audacious science fiction films ever made. The complexities of space are on screen, but the film's message is about mankind, our planet and the consequences of actions.

fields.title: Harry Potter
fields.review: The films are imaginative, funny, frightening and, of course, magical! What makes them so successful is that they combine action, fantasy and friendship. If you like adventure and magic, you'll love the Harry Potter films!

fields.title: Stranger Things
fields.review: The series captures the essence of 80s perfectly. Has a new theme- A bit scary and full of thrill. You start loving the Characters as you watch the series. Upto season 4 the season has matched my expectations.

fields.title: Reply 1988
fields.review: Reply 1988 outshines its predecessors. This drama connects us to the nostalgic memory lane of simpleness of life for average people and emphasizes the camaraderie between families, friends, neighbors & every one.

fields.title: Friend Zone
fields.review: Not only a must watch but a mustx2 watch :) the movie ending was always going to be what we all expect but the twists and turns were what made this movie a memorable one.

fields.title: Suckseed
fields.review: This movie was simply Amazing. What can I say, everything about it is great. This film really made me laugh out loud literally nearly every five minutes and the rest of the time, with a broad smile. Not only is it funny, but the story and acting are also executed perfectly.

fields.title: (500) Days of Summer
fields.review: (500) Days is a funny, seductive, and surprisingly honest dramatization of the ways we snooker ourselves into incompatible love. The kind of film that comes around every 10 years. A true, funny kind of love story that's not a love story at the same time.

fields.title: Fantastic Beasts
fields.review: This film is gorgeously looking and hilarious, has an interesting plot (though complicated at times), benefits from a talented cast, and works as a Harry Potter spin-off.

fields.title: On Your Wedding Day
fields.review: This movie hits you hard. Whether you've been in a relationship before or not, it isn't an easy and beautifully perfect thing most movies tend to show you and this movie doesn't have a problem showing you the reality of things.

fields.title: Miracle in Cell No.7
fields.review: A lot of people said that this movie has a really sad plot. I'm really curious to see how the movie goes.
